alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 18 at 4:51PM EST until November 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, leading to totals of 3 to 5 inches north of Jefferson. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight tonight. For the Winter Storm Watch, Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Heavy lake effect snow will impact travel in northern Ashtabula County, including along I-90, this evening. Travel may become very difficult Saturday night into Sunday once again. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
